Summary: a large, slowly moving, blue-white oval shaped glow appeared in the sky
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Fargo
There were no other sightings in Fargo on or around January 15th 2007
divs: Sighting Detailsi was walking my dog late at night. it was winter and mostlycloudy. i looked up in the sky and throug a break in the clouds i could see a fairly large oval shaped light, appearing about the size of a nickle held out at arms length. it was bright but had a soft glow. and though it would probably be considered white it had a strong blue hue to it. it was moving but not very quickly. it appeared to be pretty far away. i felt scared because i couldn't think of an explanation for what it was, nothing seemed to fit.i could immediatly rule out the possibility that it was a plane, satelite, or just lights from the city which often appear in the winter. it was much to bright and clearly shaped to just be from city lights. i am used to all of the possibilities i could think of and it wasn't any of these. even my dog took notice that there was something odd in the sky. after a few minutes it dissapeared behind the clouds and i couldn't see it anymore.
